author: jezdez
message:
Fixed #16273 -- Fixed typo in staticfiles docs. Thanks, BernhardEssl.

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@16407 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch: @@ -68,7 +68,7 @@ Basic usage .. code-block:: html+django - See :ref:`staticfiles-in-templates` for more details, including an alternate method using a template tag. @@ -167,7 +167,7 @@ Once that's done, you can refer to :setting:`STATIC_URL` in your templates: .. code-block:: html+django - If ``{{ STATIC_URL }}`` isn't working in your template, you're probably not using :class:`~django.template.RequestContext` when rendering the template.
